scripts.installDependencies: npm i && cd tools && npm i && cd .. && cd backend && npm i && cd .. && cd ui && npm i && cd .. && cd process && npm i
scripts.ui: cd ui && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.main: cd backend && npm run build && cd .. && cd process && npm run build && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.buildBackend: npx tsc backend/cli.ts backend/command-handler.ts backend/ipc-bridge.ts backend/commands/command-interface.ts backend/commands/command-registry.ts backend/commands/ping-command.ts backend/commands/calculate-command.ts backend/commands/help-command.ts --outDir backend/dist --module ESNext --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.buildWindowsApp: npm run buildBackend && npm run buildUI && npm run buildProcess && npx rimraf dist && cd tools && npm run build
scripts.buildMacApp: dont use it but will be easy to implement in the tools project
scripts.buildLinuxApp: dont use it but will be easy to implement in the tools project
